source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a winter landscape scenery shot capturing a serene, snow-covered rural property at twilight. The video pans across a vast expanse of deep, white snow, revealing several buildings including a small log cabin and a larger red house, both adorned with warm, festive string lights. Bare, skeletal trees stand against a cloudy, dusky sky, while a couple of parked cars and a snowmobile are partially buried in the snow. There is no main subject in the video; instead, the camera's sweeping motion is intended to capture the quiet, cold atmosphere and the picturesque quality of the entire snowy environment, emphasizing the scale and tranquility of the setting.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt:
The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject. Please concisely specify the type of scenery shot (e.g., a landscape or cityscape scenery shot) in a single fluent paragraph.Also explain why there is no main subject, such as the focus being on the environment, atmosphere, or scale rather than a specific object. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.

Please avoid using phrases like "the first frame" or "the last frame" in your description. Instead, refer to the entire sequence simply as "the video." Your description should integrate observations from all frames into a cohesive, temporally and logically consistent narrative, rather than describing frames in isolation. Whenever you mention a subject, be sure to include detailed descriptions of its key visual attributes. The final output should be a single, fluent paragraph describing the video, with no Markdown formatting or introductory text. Don't mention the surroundings or the subject's motion unless necessary to distinguish subjects by location, action, or relationship.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a winter landscape scenery shot capturing a serene, snow-covered rural property at twilight. The video pans across a vast expanse of deep, white snow, revealing several buildings including a small log cabin and a larger red house, both adorned with warm, festive string lights. Bare, skeletal trees stand against a cloudy, dusky sky, while a couple of parked cars and a snowmobile are partially buried in the snow. There is no main subject in the video; instead, the camera's sweeping motion is intended to capture the quiet, cold atmosphere and the picturesque quality of the entire snowy environment, emphasizing the scale and tranquility of the setting.

generated_critique: The caption uses subjective adjectives such as "serene," "picturesque," and "tranquility," which should be removed to maintain a neutral, descriptive tone as per the instructions. The description of the lights is slightly inaccurate; it states that both the log cabin and the red house are adorned with lights, but the lights are on the log cabin and a bush next to the red house, not the house itself. The caption also omits two other prominent structures visible in the scene: a red building with two white garage doors and a large, dark-colored building in the background. Finally, the last sentence, which explains the lack of a main subject, could be more concise by removing the speculative phrase "is intended to."
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This is a winter landscape scenery shot capturing a snow-covered rural property at twilight. The video pans across a vast expanse of deep, white snow, revealing several buildings. A small log cabin has string lights on its corner, and in the background, a large, dark-colored building is visible. A couple of parked cars and a snowmobile are partially buried in the snow. The pan continues past a red building with two white garage doors to a larger red house. A bush next to the red house is also decorated with string lights. Bare trees stand against a cloudy, dusky sky. There is no main subject in the video; the camera's sweeping motion captures the entire snowy environment, emphasizing the scale of the setting.
